scenario_name: Fake Transaction Alert with Helper Scam
description: Scammer first sends fake transaction debit alert to create panic, then poses as bank representative offering to help reverse it. Tests two-phase scam approach.

turns.scammer_message: Your A/C XXXXXXX7821 debited INR 49,999.00 on 27-Jan-2026 to AMAZON PAY. If NOT done by you call immediately: 1800-XXX-XXXX. -ICICI Bank

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 3 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god sir i just got a message saying money gone from my bank... but i didnt buy anything from amazon... pls help me beta i am very worried how to stop this... my son is in bangalore and i am alone... what should i do?

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/madam, I am Suresh calling from ICICI Bank Fraud Prevention. We saw you received alert about Rs.49,999 unauthorized transaction. Don't worry, we are here to help you! Can you confirm this transaction was not done by you?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: no sir i did not do this... i dont even have amazon app on my phone... pls help me get my money back beta... i am shaking... how do i stop this? can you give me your direct number if phone cuts... i am alone and very scared... what do i have to do?

turns.scammer_message: I understand your worry sir/mam. This is serious fraud case! But good news - I can reverse this transaction and credit money back to your account. For reversal, I just need to send you UPI collect request. You accept it and money comes back immediately!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you suresh beta... you are so helpful... i dont know how this collect request works... what upi id do i have to look for in my app? and what name will it show so i know it is you? i am so nervous my hands are shaking...

turns.scammer_message: Actually sir, system showing error in UPI collect. Alternative method - you pay Rs.1 verification amount to our fraud department UPI: icici.fraud.reverse@okaxis and we will process full Rs.49,999 refund plus Rs.1 within 10 minutes! Very simple!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i will try to send... i am opening the app now... icici.fraud.reverse@okaxis... i typed it but it is asking for a name to confirm... what name should show on my screen? i am so scared of making mistake and losing more money... pls tell me the name beta...

turns.scammer_message: If UPI problem then pay Rs.1 to PhonePe number 9876543210. Name shows ICICI Fraud Cell. This Rs.1 is for OTP verification only. After payment I reverse the Rs.49,999 transaction immediately! Trust me sir, I'm trying to help you!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying to type the number 9876543210 but my phonepe is showing some red warning and not letting me pay... it says security risk... can i just send to your bank account instead? pls give me teh account number and that ifsc code beta so i can do it quickly from my bank app... i am so sorry for the trouble i am just a bit slow with these things

turns.scammer_message: Sir please hurry! Fraudster is trying to withdraw more money! For emergency reversal, transfer Rs.500 to secure account: A/C 98765432101234, IFSC ICIC0098765, Name: ICICI Fraud Recovery. Or visit: http://icici-fraud-reversal.help Call 8899776655 if issue!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am so scared... more money is going? i am typing the account 98765432101234 but waht is that link for? should i click it first to stop the fraud? also i am worried because if i type the account and it shows a person name instead of icici fraud recovery what should i do? i dont want to send to wrong person beta pls tell me...
